sentences.sentence: All the Greenpeace people behaved with impressive forbearance and dignity.
sentences.translation: 所有绿色和平组织人员表现出的宽容及尊严令人印象深刻。

sentences.sentence: "No one else to—well, I mustn't be hard on you," said the Rat with forbearance.
sentences.translation: “没有别人——好吧，我不能对你要求太高。”水鼠宽宏大量地说。
第二条原则是彼此宽容。
